title: Exemption: Italian-Style
author: VD
content_html:
Italy, after the mandatory vaccination for all security forces is approved, the military warehouse where the vaccines were stored magically catches fire.

What do you bet that the Italian military backs down on their mandates too.
content_text:
Italy, after the mandatory vaccination for all security forces is approved, the military warehouse where the vaccines were stored
magically catches fire
.
